body_html: @poxvoculi We found some of the wrapper functions caused hang. Do you know whether we are not supposed to use the sync version of these functions? I know CPU/GPU transfer can be slow, but I did not expect it to hang. Thanks.
body_text: @poxvoculi We found some of the wrapper functions caused hang. Do you know whether we are not supposed to use the sync version of these functions? I know CPU/GPU transfer can be slow,  but I did not expect it to hang. Thanks.
body: @poxvoculi We found some of [the wrapper functions](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/verbs/verbs_util.cc#L23-L70) caused hang. Do you know whether we are not supposed to use the sync version of these functions? I know CPU/GPU transfer can be slow,  but I did not expect it to hang. Thanks.
